nodes.text: R2-RN8W was a rainbow-colored astromech droid of the R2 line. It enjoyed celebrating with others on the Core Worlds planet of Coruscant, which it did during the celebration of the fall of Emperor Palpatine in 4 ABY. Its dome had primary photo receptors, radar eyes, a data card reader, and a Herner optical holographic projector.

The front of its body had a Burtt acoustic signaler, system ventilation, hi-powered recharge coupling, and heat exhaust. Its legs were made of durasteel and had motorized treads, and the right leg had a system lubricant filter/reservoir, an accentuating coupler, and a hydraulic arm shaft. The middle leg was retractable and the left leg had a quick-release fuel system latch. The droid's back had a cargo department.
R2-RN8W was created for a Disney Parks exclusive figure as part of the Star Wars: Droid Factory toy line, released in 2021.
